text: Marc Le Fur (born November 28, 1956 in Dakar, Senegal) is a French politician of the Republicans who serves as a member of the National Assembly of France, representing the Côtes-d'Armor department. In parliament, Le Fur serves on the Finance Committee. In addition to his committee assignments, he is a member of the French-Nigerian Parliamentary Friendship Group and the French-Ukrainian Parliamentary Friendship Group.Marc Le Fur French National Assembly. In the Republicans’ 2017 leadership election, Le Fur endorsed Laurent Wauquiez as chairman.Ludovic Vigogne (October 11, 2017), La liste des 136 parrains de Laurent Wauquiez L'Opinion. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:The Republicans (France) politicians Category:Breton people Category:Politicians from Brittany Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 15th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Sciences Po alumni Category:École nationale d'administration alumni
title: Marc Le Fur
